directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: The Bank of Japan plans a historic interest rate hike, impacting the global economy and leading to volatility in cryptocurrency markets.
By officially putting an end to the quantitative tightening (QT) on Dec. 1, the US Federal Reserve has initiated the first steps for...

Crypto whales—entities holding significant portions of a token's supply—play a pivotal role in shaping market dynamics through their buying,...
Japan's rising bond yields drive gold and silver higher while pressuring Bitcoin as global liquidity tightens.

hypothesis_content.title: Post-Liquidity-Crash Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: After October's structural liquidity crash, the current volatility compression (BTC 10-day realized vol < 40%) will resolve with an upward breakout within 3 days when spot CVD turns positive while funding rates remain neutral.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Structural liquidity crashes create prolonged compression periods. When spot buying returns without excessive leverage (neutral funding), it often signals genuine accumulation before a sustainable move. Current neutral regime with recent liquidity news provides catalyst potential.
entry_conditions: Spot Cumulative Volume Delta (4H) turns positive after 12+ hours negative/neutral
Aggregate funding rates across majors between -0.001% and +0.001%

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price decreases 2% from entry OR volatility expands downward (realized vol spikes >60% with price drop)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility compression resolves downward despite positive spot CVD, or expands without directional move (>5% vol increase with <1% price change).
